attributes.action: Give the same level of protection to buyers of new homes as that of other goods.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Home buyers are not given the same level of legal protection with regard to faults and defects as purchasers of other goods as they are not included under the sale of goods and services act. There needs to be a much greater level of protection with what is essentially peoples largest life time purchase.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
